update tbl_installment 
set  inst_first_installment_date = '2020-07-01'
where sell_id = 107;

--
update tbl_installment 
set inst_date = DATE_ADD(inst_date,INTERVAL -1 MONTH)
where sell_id = 107 and inst_num > 1;

update tbl_installment 
set inst_num  = 2
where sell_id = 107 and inst_date = '2020-07-22';

update tbl_installment 
set inst_num  = 1
where sell_id = 107 and inst_date = '2020-07-01';
